quote: Bardur and the boy had leaned back a bit and looked at the sparkling sky that makes us humble and powerful at once and seems sometimes to speak to us. What is says carefully cleanses old wounds.
quote_letters: BARDUR AND THE BOY HAD LEANED BACK A BIT AND LOOKED AT THE SPARKLING SKY THAT MAKES US HUMBLE AND POWERFUL AT ONCE AND SEEMS SOMETIMES TO SPEAK TO US WHAT IS SAYS CAREFULLY CLEANSES OLD WOUNDS
